divs: Sighting DetailsI watched the firey object glide silently through the sky.At first i thaught it was one of those candle kite things you can light that fly until I seen move above the trees towards me and noticed it was alot bigger than thatand had a diamond shape inside the fire. went got the camera but it was full so i had to use the crappy cell phone camera which took a few crappy pictures. I am very dissapointed in myself.
Summary: I was smoking a ciggarette on my deck and seen the fire light through the canopy of pine trees
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hudson
There were no other sightings in Hudson on or around June 17th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
